task.title: Logging In and Creating a Pipeline
task.shortdesc: After you start the , you can log in to the console and create your first pipeline.

context.p: Data Collectorlogging in and creating a pipelinelogging inData CollectorYou can customize the address and login that you use to access the . This procedure uses the default settings.

step.cmd: To access the Data Collector console, enter the following text in the address bar of your browser:

info.p: If you customized the , use the following format: <host name>:<port no>

step.cmd: In the Login dialog box, use the following credentials to log in: admin / admin.
step.info: If you created a custom login, feel free to use it.

step.cmd: On the Get Started page, click Create Pipeline.
In the New Pipeline window, enter a name for the pipeline, optionally enter a description, and click Save.
step.info: The Data Collector console appears. The Properties panel displays pipeline properties.

taskbody.postreq: For the steps to configure a pipeline, continue with step 5 in "Configuring a Pipeline".
